Author: bleepbloophumanoid
Text: Honestly recovery is difficult without therapy. I think meditation and mindfulness can help, especially if you join a local meditation group.   Talking to someone you trust is also a good optionâ€”someone kind and not judgmental.   Are you still in school? If so, your school might offer free counseling sessions. I know there are also inexpensive apps out there where you can talk to a therapist, like headspace. Even a few sessions could help.
